name: Carbonic dichloride, polymer with 4,4'-(1-methylethylidene)bis[phenol], 4-(1-methyl-1-phenylethyl)phenyl ester (polycarbonate resins)
FoodContactSubstance: Carbonic dichloride, polymer with 4,4'-(1-methylethylidene)bis[phenol], 4-(1-methyl-1-phenylethyl)phenyl ester (polycarbonate resins) (CAS Reg. No. 11211-39-3).  The resins are produced by the condensation of 4,4'-(isopropylidenediphenol) and carbonyl chloride.  The manufacturing process may include optional adjuvant substances authorized in the production of the resins.
